title: Rush Hour podcast: Keep the sedition law and make it harsher, says Law Commission
content: In today’s edition, another Indian-made medicine comes under the scanner abroad, the Law Commission calls for a stricter punishment for sedition, details of sexual harassment allegations against Brij Bhushan Sharan Singh, and more.Scripted and hosted by Abhik Deb, produced and edited by Avinash Kumar.To get every episode directly in your inbox, sign up now⁠⁠. You can also listen to this podcast on Spotify and Google Podcasts.References⁠Molestation, demand for sexual favours: What wrestlers alleged in FIR against Brij Bhushan Singh⁠Wrestlers protest shows how Indian law is a tool of oppression rather than an instrument of justice⁠⁠Mumbai’s JJ Hospital to The Gambia: 36 years apart but a familiar story of deadly toxic drugs⁠⁠‘Every idea is an incitement’: Where is the line between democratic protest and sedition?⁠⁠Was there ever an Akhand Bharat? Could there ever be one? This book examines the question⁠
